Text:
The Russian written titles in the description didn't come out right; fuck it. The song names should appear just fine, at least in Windows Media Player (they do on my Windows 7 machine without any special language modification).

The EP they're selling, Surviving a Bad Dream, is in this. You can legally get it for free, but if you like them, the next time you have an extra 5 bucks, buy it. It won't financially help them, it'll just show that people want their shit enough to buy it.
